segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely focused on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the faucet has been running like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is practically flooding, and she’s just polishing dishes like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned it off yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and the floor must be slippery by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one slips and hurts themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so absorbed in her task that she doesn’t even glance at the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
